query: best hotels in Rome for weddings luxury and affordable
title: Best hotels in Rome for weddings: Luxurious but affordable
excerpt: Finding the perfect hotel for a wedding in Rome can be a daunting task, especially when balancing luxury with affordability. This curated list highlights venues that not only offer stunning settings and exceptional service but also fit within a reasonable budget. Couples can save time and stress by exploring these options, ensuring their special day is both memorable and financially feasible.
intro: Discover a selection of Rome's best hotels that beautifully blend luxury and affordability for your dream wedding.

hotels.name: Hotel Capannelle Roma
hotels.description: Experience comfort and modern design at Hotel Capannelle, where air-conditioned rooms come with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs for your entertainment. Start your day effortlessly with convenient breakfast boxes and enjoy a prime location just 6 km from Rome Ciampino Airport, making it easy to explore historic sites and nearby attractions like Quintili Villa and Capannelle Racecourse. Book your stay for an unforgettable Roman getaway.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Capannelle Roma boasts a charming reception hall, refreshing pool, and attentive concierge services for memorable wedding celebrations.

hotels.name: Hotel Ferrari
hotels.description: Hotel Ferrari features modern rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi, a TV, and private bathrooms equipped with essential toiletries. Guests can enjoy a delightful buffet breakfast each morning, offering a variety of sweet and savory options. Ideally located just 100 meters from Rome Termini Station and a short stroll from major attractions like the Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore and the Coliseum, this hotel provides the perfect base for exploring the vibrant city.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Ferrari offers modern rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi, a delightful buffet breakfast, and a prime location near major attractions.

hotels.name: Hotel Virginia
hotels.description: Hotel Virginia boasts a prime location between two Metro lines, providing easy access to explore the wonders of Rome while offering affordable, air-conditioned rooms in a serene setting. Guests are greeted with warm hospitality and efficient service, including a 24-hour reception and complimentary tourist maps. Just a short 10-minute walk from local markets and iconic attractions, Hotel Virginia is the perfect base for immersing yourself in the vibrant culture of the city.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Virginia offers affordable, air-conditioned rooms, a 24-hour reception, and easy access to Rome's iconic attractions.

hotels.name: Hotel Orazia
hotels.description: Hotel Orazia is perfectly situated just 20 meters from the Vittorio Emanuele Metro Station, making it an ideal base for exploring Rome's iconic sights, including the Coliseum, which is only a 10-minute walk away. Guests will enjoy modern, air-conditioned rooms featuring marble floors, satellite flat-screen TVs, and private bathrooms, with some offering charming views of the garden square. Each morning, a delicious buffet breakfast awaits, featuring a variety of options from fresh pastries to cold cuts, ensuring a delightful start to your Roman adventure.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Orazia offers modern rooms with marble floors, air conditioning, and a buffet breakfast, all just steps from the metro.

hotels.name: Hotel Delle Muse
hotels.description: Nestled in the tranquil Parioli District of Rome, Hotel Delle Muse offers a cozy escape with comfortable rooms featuring air conditioning and flat-screen TVs. Guests can indulge in a delightful breakfast buffet in the garden during summer and enjoy authentic Italian cuisine on the spacious covered terrace. Just a short stroll from Villa Ada park and a quick drive to Auditorium Parco della Musica, this family-run hotel combines charm with easy access to the city's vibrant attractions.
hotels.highlight: Offers comfortable rooms with air conditioning, a restaurant with authentic Italian cuisine, and a charming terrace for dining.

hotels.name: Hotel Scott House
hotels.description: Experience the charm of the 19th-century Hotel Scott House, located on the upper floors of a historic building in central Rome. Just steps away from Termini Station, this hotel provides easy access to iconic attractions like the Coliseum and the Spanish Steps, ensuring a seamless travel experience. Enjoy modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi and well-equipped rooms, all while soaking in the unique ambiance of this timeless setting.
hotels.highlight: Offers soundproof rooms and modern amenities, all within a charming 19th-century setting in central Rome.
